caption.p: The antifungal activity of A. factorovskyi ethanolic extract and silver nanoparticles. The antifungal activities of A. factorovskyi, and AF-AgNPs, were tested against four fungal species. ( A) The species were cultured on potato dextrose agar Petri dishes and treated with either A. factorovskyi ethanolic extract or AF-AgNPs. ( B) The mycelium growth inhibition in (mm) for the fungal species treated with either A. factorovskyi ethanolic extract or the biosynthesized silver nanoparticles.
